result.eng: Spies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.orig: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuair
result.html: Bhíothas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an chogaidh fhuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag malartú spiairí anseo aimsir an ċogaiḋ ḟuairSpies were being exchanged here during the cold war.

result.eng: They were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ga: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhíothas ag fógairt go raibh eitleán tar éis dochar a dhéanamh d'fhoirgneamh i Nua-EabhracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoṫas ag fógairt go raiḃ eitleán tar éis doċar a ḋéanaṁ d'ḟoirgneaṁ i Nua-EaḃracThey were announcing [on the radio] that an airplane had done some damage to a building in New York.

result.eng: A few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ga: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.orig: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáide
result.html: Traidhfil blianta ó shin bhíothas ag caint ar bhreacadh ré úr do na meáin chumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
result.ponchtml: Traiḋfil blianta ó ẛin ḃíoṫas ag caint ar ḃreacaḋ ré úr do na meáin ċumarsáideA few years ago people were talking about the dawning of a new age for the media.
